ISSUE.TITLE: Fix a typo
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50.4 Within the "Inventory" section is a typographical error in the selections for "Product availability range". The selection in error (in the English version) is "2 week", which should be "2 weeks" because "weeks" needs to plural. It shows as "2 week" also in the Public store.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch '4.50-bug-fixes' into develop # Conflicts: # src/Libraries/Nop.Core/NopVersion.cs # src/Libraries/Nop.Data/Nop.Data.csproj

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6395 Fixed a typo in product availability range option
